title: Hlala Nami
text:
1. Ku yeza ukuhlwa, hlala nami, U zuhlale nami, sekuyahlwa
Lapho abanye sebehluleka, Wena osizayo, hlala nami

Ku shesh’ ukudlula ukuphila, Ubuhle bomhlaba buphi bona?
Izinto zonke zi yaphenduka, Ongaphendukiyo hlala nami

Ngi yakucela u hlale nami, U ngekho ngohlulwa yizilingo
U ngezi ‘Nkosi, njengodlulayo, Kodwa ‘Nkosi yami, hlala nami


Owahlala kade, hlala nami, Ungabongishiya nakancane
Bekezel’ ububi bami bonke, Yiza-ke u zozakhela kimi

Inhlupheko azinani kimi, Ang’esabi, nxa u khona Wena
Lu ngaphi u donsi lwakho kufa?, Ngi zokwahlula ngoba u nami

title: Ku Khona uMthombo
text:
1. Ku khon’ uMthombo wegazi Ovel’ eNkosini, Zonk’ izoni zi ngagezwa, Ngokuy’ eNkosini
Zi ngahlanjululwa Ezonweni zazo, Zonke zi ngathethelwa Ebubini bazo

Isela elalengayo, Lathab’ ukubona, Lowo ‘Mthombo ofunayo Ukugez’ aboni
Noma ngi nezono, Ngi ngahlanjululwa, Kuwo uMthombo waboni, Ngi nga gezisiswa


Yebo, Wundlu elafayo Si yabona Wena, Ibandl’ elasindiswayo Selomele Wena
Li namandl’ igazi Ukugez’ izono, Ibandla li ngasindiswa Li zonde ukwona

‘Nkosi u ngilungisele Indawo ekhaya, Noma-nje ngi ngafanele Wena wa ngifela
Wongipha umvuzo Ngay’ impilo entsha, Wongipha njalo umvuzo Ngay’ impilo entsha

Ku khon’ isihlabelelo, Ngaso ngi babaza, Amandlayo insindiso, Seloku ngahlanzwa
Ngi vuk’ engcwabeni Ngobabaza Wena, Lu phinde kaning’ ulimi Lu dumisa Wena

title: KUDZAI MAMBO ANO UTSVENE
text:
1. Kudzai Mambo ano utsvene 
 Ari kudenga ana masimba; 
 Ndiye nhoo yedu yakare kare 
 Chigare chake chakakurumbidzwa.
 2. Imbai masimba nengoni dzake; 
 Ari kudenga nenguo chena 
 Hasha dzake dzose dzinotinhira. 
 Anofamba zvake pachamupupuri. 
 3. Ana masimba wakaisika,
 Nyika nezvinhu zvose zvirimo; 
 Wakaitsigira nemurairo, 
 Wakaikombera nemvura yose 
 4. Kufudza kwako kusingarehwi; 
 Kuri pamhepo napakupenya.
Kuri pamakomo napamakan’a,
 Kuri pane mvura napane dova. 
 5. Isu vaduku hatine simba, 
 Tinotarira chete kwauri; 
 Tsitsi dzako dzose dzisingaperi.
 Hama yakanaka nomununuri. 
 6. Una masimba norudo rwose:
 Dzinoimbira dzose kudenga 
 Nesuwo venyika tinoimbira.
 Tinokurumbidza kusingaperi

title: Amazing Grace
text:
1. John Newton, 1779
[Key: Eb]

Verse 1
Amazing Grace
How sweet the sound,
That saved a wretch like me!
I once was lost,
But now am found;
Was blind, but now I see.

Verse 2
‘Twas grace that taught
My heart to fear,
And grace my fears relieved;
How precious
Did that grace appear
The hour I first believed!

Verse 3
Through many dangers,
Toils and snares,
I have already come;
‘Tis grace hath brought
Me safe thus far,
And grace will lead me home.

Verse 4
The Lord has promised
Good to me,
His Word my hope secures;
He will my Shield
And Portion be,
As long as life endures.

Verse 5
Yea, when this flesh
And heart shall fail,
And mortal life shall cease,
I shall possess,
Within the veil,
A life of joy and peace.

Verse 6
The earth shall soon
Dissolve like snow,
The sun forbear to shine;
But God, Who called me
Here below,
Will be forever mine.

Verse 7
When we’ve been there
Ten thousand years,
Bright shining as the sun,
We’ve no less days
To sing God’s praise
Than when we’d first begun.

title: MWARI URI ZUVA REDU
text:
1. Mwari uri zuva redu,
Unopenya pauzuru;
Asi Mweya ungaone
Paunozofamba napo.
2. Mwari uri nhoo yedu,
Hatidzitye hondo dzedu.
Dzose dzinokundwa newe,
Tigouya nokufara.
3. Unotipa ngoni dzako,
Unotipa noutsvene.
Unopa vanonamata,
Unopa Rukomborero.
4. Rukomborero rukuru
Rukomborero rwedenga,
Ruripo rwavanofunga,
Kuti vanodiswa newe.

title: KUDZA JEHOVHA MWARI ANE SIMBA
Standing on the Promises
text:
1. Verse 1
Standing on the promises of Christ my King,
Through eternal ages let His praises ring,
Glory in the highest, I will shout and sing,
Standing on the promises of God.

Chorus
Standing, standing,
Standing on the promises of God my Savior;
Standing, standing,
I’m standing on the promises of God.

Verse 2
Standing on the promises that cannot fail,
When the howling storms of doubt and fear assail,
By the living Word of God I shall prevail,
Standing on the promises of God.

Chorus
Standing, standing,
Standing on the promises of God my Savior;
Standing, standing,
I’m standing on the promises of God.

Verse 3
Standing on the promises of Christ the Lord,
Bound to Him eternally by love’s strong cord,
Overcoming daily with the Spirit’s sword,
Standing on the promises of God.

Chorus
Standing, standing,
Standing on the promises of God my Savior;
Standing, standing,
I’m standing on the promises of God.

Verse 4
Standing on the promises I cannot fall,
Listening every moment to the Spirit’s call
Resting in my Savior as my all in all,
Standing on the promises of God.

Chorus
Standing, standing,
Standing on the promises of God my Savior;
Standing, standing,
I’m standing on the promises of God.

title: MUKUDZEI IYE MWARI
text:
1. Mukudzei iye Mwari,
Navari kudenga;
Mukudzei iye MwarI.
Navari kudenga.
2. Imi muri nhume dzake,
Mukudzei iye;
Nemi muri hondo dzake,
Mukudzei iye.
3. Iwe zuva newe mwedzi,
Mukudzei iye.
Nemiwo imi nyenyedzi,
Mukudzei iye.
4. Iwe mwoto, newe chando,
Mukudzei iye;
Iwe chando, newe bvute,
Mukudzei iye.
5. Newe mhepo inovhuvhuta
Chimukudza iye;
Newe ita izwi rake,
Paunozonzwika.
6. Imi muri vaShe mose,
Mukudzei iye.
Nemi imi vanhu mose,
Mukudzei iye.
7. Nemi vanhu machembera,
Mukudzei iye.
Nemi mhuri yose,
Mukudzei iye.

title: Bawo
text:
1. Bawo, Bawo, Bawo
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile
Bawo, Bawo, Bawo
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile
Bawo, Bawo, Bawo, Bawo (Bawo)
Eh Bawo (Bawo)
Eh Bawo (Bawo)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Ndiyabonga (Usandigcinile)
Bawo, Bawo, Bawo, Bawo (Bawo)
Eh Bawo (Bawo)
Bawo (Bawo)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile
Mmeli wami Bawo
Uhlal'uhlez'eduze kwami
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandi, usandigcinile
Mmeli wami Bawo
Uhlal'uhlez'eduze kwami
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandi, usandigcinile
Ndithi hlal'uhlez'eduze kwami (Bawo)
Bawo (Bawo)
Eh Bawo (Bawo)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile
Hlal'uhlez'eduze kwami (Bawo)
Bawo (Bawo)
Eh Bawo (Bawo)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile
Eh Mmeli wami Bawo (Bawo uhlal'uhlez'eduze kwami)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile, Usandigcinile
Ndithi Mmeli wami wena Bawo (Bawo uhlal'uhlez'eduze kwami)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile, Usandigcinile
Ndithi hlal'uhlez'eduze kwami
Eh Bawo
Bawo
Eh Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandi, usandigcinile
Ndithi hlal'uhlez'eduze kwami
Eh Bawo
Bawo
Eh Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Eh man usandigcinile wena man
Ndithi Mmeli wami Bawo (Bawo uhlal'uhlez'eduze kwami)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile, usandigcinile
Ndithi Mmeli wami wena Bawo (Bawo uhlal'uhlez'eduze kwami)
Bawo ndiyabonga ngoba
Usandigcinile, usandigcinile.

title: NGATITENDE KUJEHOVHA
text:
1. Ngatitende kuJehovha ,
Kuti wakanaka.
Kuti dzose ngoni dzake,
Hadzizonopera.
2. Ngavadaro Israeri,
Imba dzavo dzose.
Kuti dzose ngoni dzake,
Hadzizonopera.
3. Takashevedza Jehovha,
Tanga tamanikwa;
Wakazotiisa iye,
Kunzvimbo yo’fadza.
4. Kana Ishe wakatida,
Hatigoni kutya;
Angamuka angadiiko,
Munhu’yu kwatiri?
5. Izvo Ishe wakatida,
Anotiyamura;
Atiyamure zvikuru,
Kuvavengi vedu.
6. Kuvimba naiye Ishe,
Nokunzvenga naye;
Ndizvo zvakanakanaka,
Kusavimba vanhu.
7. Ngatipone newe Ishe,
Utiropafadze;
Tizorore newe Ishe,
Utiropafadze;
Undiropafadze.

title: The Love of God
text:
1. Verse 1
The love of God is greater far
Than tongue or pen can ever tell.
It goes beyond the highest star
And reaches to the lowest hell.
The guilty soul, bowed down with care,
God gave His Son to win;
His erring child He reconciled
And pardoned from his sin.

Chorus
O love of God, how rich and pure!
How measureless and strong!
It shall forevermore endure
The saints’ and angels’ song.

Verse 2
When hoary time shall pass away,
And earthly thrones and kingdoms fall;
When men who here refuse to bow,
On rocks and hills and mountains call;
God’s love, so sure, shall still endure,
All measureless and strong;
Redeeming grace to Adam’s race
The saints’ and angels’ song.

Chorus
O love of God, how rich and pure!
How measureless and strong!
It shall forevermore endure
The saints’ and angels’ song.

Verse 3
Could we with ink the ocean fill,
And were the skies of parchment made;
Were every stalk on earth a quill,
And every man a scribe by trade;
To write the love of God above
Would drain the ocean dry;
Nor could the scroll contain the whole,
Though stretched from sky to sky.

Chorus
O love of God, how rich and pure!
How measureless and strong!
It shall forevermore endure
The saints’ and angels’ song.

title: NDINOSHAMISWA KWAZVO
text:
1. Ndinoshamiswa kwazvo,
Namabasa makuru;
Akaitiwa newe,
Ose anorumbidza ,
Ukuru hwako Mwari,
Hunoshamisa kwazvo.
2. Kana ndarangarira mabasa ,
okudenga,
Kana ndarangarira mabsa apanyika,
Inobuda misodzi,
Kana ndafunga iwe.
3. Mwari vatatu, mumwe,
Ita kuti tikude;
Nokuti wakatida,
Wakazotipa Jesu,
Wakatipa Mweya wako,
Wokutipupurira.
4. Rumbidza iwe denga! Rumbidza iwe nyika,
Rumbidza iwe nguva!
Nesu ngatirumbidze!
Uyu Musiki wedu,
Unorudo rukuru.

title: ZADZISA CHIREVO CHAKO
text:
1. Zadzisa chirevo chako,
Mwari, Ishe wechokwadi.
Ose marudzi enyika;
Ngaawane ruponiso.
2. Namabvi kuneyi nyika,
Ngaapfugame panewe;
Dzidzamare dzose ndimi,
Dzireve ukuru hwako.
3. Tonga, tonga Ishe Jeu,
Kuuya newe kufara;
Nezvikanganiso zvedu,
Yatadzika yose nyika.
4. Tarira nyika yokwedu,
Urege kuipa kwayo.
Urege kutsamwa kwako,
Isingafi mhuri yako.
5. Ramba Ishe tisazvidza,
Zvidzidziso zvezwi rako;
Ugozotimutsira ,
Tinzwe nechokwadi chako.

title: To God Be the Glory
text:
1. Verse 1
To God be the glory, great things He hath done!
So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,
Who yielded His life an atonement for sin,
And opened the life gate that all may go in.

Chorus
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the earth hear His voice!
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the people rejoice!
O come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,
And give Him the glory, great things He has done.

Verse 2
O perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,
To every believer the promise of God;
The vilest offender who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

Chorus
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the earth hear His voice!
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the people rejoice!
O come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,
And give Him the glory, great things He has done.

Verse 3
Great things He has taught us, great things He has done,
And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;
But purer, and higher, and greater will be
Our wonder, our transport, when Jesus we see.

Chorus
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the earth hear His voice!
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the people rejoice!
O come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,
And give Him the glory, great things He has done.

title: UYAI VAKRISTU
text:
1. Uyai VaKristu,
Nokufara nokukunda;
Uyai, uyai kwaBethrehem;
Uyai muone.
Ishe wengirosi,
Uyai, ngatimutende,
Kristi, Ishe.
2. Mwari wavamwari,
Kuchena kokuchena;
Wazvarwa m’komana, waMariya,
Mwari wechokwadi.
Mwari pakutanga,
Uyai ngatimutende,
Kristu Ishe. denga rakatinhira nokuimba
3. Imbai ngirozi,
Imbai nokufara
Imbai vanhu vose kudenga,
Tendai kuna Mwari.
Uyai gatimutende
Kristu Ishe.
4. Tinokukwazisa,
Wazvarwa iri zuva;
Ngakupiwe Kristu kutenda;
Izwi raBaba,
Zvino wakauya.
Uyai ngatimutende,
Kristu Ishe.

title: How Great Thou Art.
text:
1. Verse 1
O Lord my God, when I in awesome wonder
Consider all the works Thy hands have made,
I see the stars, I hear the rolling thunder,
Thy pow’r thru-out the universe displayed!

Chorus
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!

Verse 2
When thru the woods and forest glades I wander
And hear the birds sing sweetly in the trees,
When I look down from lofty mountain grandeur
And hear the brook and feel the gentle breeze,

Chorus
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!

Verse 3
And when I think that God, His Son not sparing,
Sent Him to die, I scarce can take it in –
That on the cross, my burden gladly bearing,
He bled and died to take away my sin!

Chorus
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!

Verse 4
When Christ shall come with shout of acclamation
And take me home, what joy shall fill my heart!
Then I shall bow in humble adoration
And there proclaim, my God, how great Thou art!

Chorus
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!
Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!

title: HOSANA WOKUDENGA
text:
1. Hosana wokudenga,
Ndo’mba nezwi rangu,
Kumwana waDavidha.
Wauya kwandiri,
Hosana ndiyamure;
Pakurema kwangu,
Wauya usadanwa,
Muponisi wangu.
2. Ndoshonga dzakadini,
Azondishanyira?
Mugadzirire iwe,
Mwoyo wako wose
Ndoupira kwauri,
Mununuri wangu;
Upfugame kwaauri;
Chokwadi Ishe wangu.
3. Ndasunungurwa newe,
mutorongo rangu.
Rikadimurwa newe,
Iro joti rangu,rakandirasikira ,
Ndasiya upenyu,
Wakandifarisazve,
Pakuchema kwangu.

title: RUMBIDZAI VANHU MOSE
text:
1. Rumbidzai vanhu vose,
Zvirumbidze zvinhu zvose;
Nhasi musi wokukudza,
Nhasi musi wokufara.
2. Mununuri wazvarwa
Rufadzo rwakauyisw.
Nhasi tsitsi dzakauya,
Nhasi kupona kwauya.
3. Haano kuuya nehondo,
Fambisai idzi nhau,
Kuti nedzo tsitsi dzake
Wauya kuzotifira.
4. Fambisai idzi nhau,
Dziende panyika yose.
Tendaika vanhu mose!
Nezvinhu zvose, zvitende.
